<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 6"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Spellguard Shield](/Equipment.aspx?ID=325)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Abjuration" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=2" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 588 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Price** 250 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** 1
</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Base Shield** [Steel Shield](/Shields.aspx?ID=3)
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This shield bears eldritch glyphs to guard against magic. While you have this [steel shield](/Shields.aspx?ID=3) (Hardness 6, HP 24, BT 12) raised, you gain its circumstance bonus to saving throws against spells that target you (as well as to AC), and you can shield block spells that target you if you have that action.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
